Class MyRecipes

java.lang.Object
  Activity
      ca.ualberta.cmput301w13t11.FoodBook.MyRecipes
All Implemented Interfaces:
FView<DbManager>
public class MyRecipes
extends Activity
implements FView<DbManager>

Displays all of the local user's recipes in a list and gives additional options with the recipes

Author:
Thomas Cline and Pablo Jaramillo
